claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
explanation: A flowchart outlining the pediatric influenza vaccination schedule: determining if a child received ≥2 doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022; if yes, administer 1 dose of 2022–23 influenza vaccine; if no or unknown, administer 2 doses of 2022–23 influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart. The image presents a dosing algorithm for pediatric influenza vaccination and does not address antigenic matching or Flublok's relationship to WHO- and FDA-selected strains; therefore, it does not support the claim.

detailed_analysis.image_description: A flowchart outlining the pediatric influenza vaccination schedule: determining if a child received ≥2 doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022; if yes, administer 1 dose of 2022–23 influenza vaccine; if no or unknown, administer 2 doses of 2022–23 influenza vaccine at least 4 weeks apart.
